FuncDef: The display bgp sr-policy ipv6 update-peer-group command displays information about update peer-groups.
CLIs: display bgp sr-policy ipv6 update-peer-group [ index <index-value> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the index value of an update peer-group for displaying details about the update peer-group.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 65535.

Examples: The IPv6 Sr-Policy instance's update peer group number : 1
Keep buffer update peer group number : 0
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display bgp sr-policy ipv6 update-peer-group command displays information about BGP update peer-groups or displays detailed information about a BGP update peer-group with a specified index.
